mapper.update: /* USE : TblmsMapper.tblmsOpn */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_TBL_TEMPPW_T A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , #{tblmsTempPw} AS TBLMS_TEMP_PW , #{tblmsLoginFg} AS TBLMS_LOGIN_FG , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS TBLMS_TEMP_PW_DT , #{tblmsTempPwRegId} AS TBLMS_TEMP_PW_REG_ID FROM DUAL ) B ON ( B.STORE_CD = A.STORE_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.TBLMS_TEMP_PW = B.TBLMS_TEMP_PW , A.TBLMS_LOGIN_FG = B.TBLMS_LOGIN_FG , A.TBLMS_TEMP_PW_DT = B.TBLMS_TEMP_PW_DT , A.TBLMS_TEMP_PW_REG_ID = B.TBLMS_TEMP_PW_REG_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD , A.TBLMS_TEMP_PW , A.TBLMS_LOGIN_FG , A.TBLMS_TEMP_PW_DT , A.TBLMS_TEMP_PW_REG_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD , B.TBLMS_TEMP_PW , B.TBLMS_LOGIN_FG , B.TBLMS_TEMP_PW_DT , B.TBLMS_TEMP_PW_REG_ID )
